# Issue 12425: Twisted uses non-standard C generated by old Pyrex

archive/issues_012253.json:
```json
{
    "body": "The file `twisted/internet/cfsupport/cfsupport.c` (which is only compiled on OS X) is generated by an old version of Pyrex and contains non-standard C.  Re-generating this file with Pyrex 0.9.4 solves the problem.\n\n**spkg**: [http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg](http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg)\n\nAssignee: tbd\n\nResolution: fixed\n\nAuthor: Jeroen Demeyer\n\nReviewer: Volker Braun\n\nMerged: sage-5.0.beta6\n\nIssue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/12425\n\n",
    "closed_at": "2012-02-27T11:22:42Z",
    "created_at": "2012-02-04T12:46:53Z",
    "labels": [
        "component: packages: standard",
        "bug"
    ],
    "milestone": "https://github.com/sagemath/sagetest/milestones/sage-5.0",
    "title": "Twisted uses non-standard C generated by old Pyrex",
    "type": "issue",
    "url": "https://github.com/sagemath/sagetest/issues/12425",
    "user": "https://github.com/jdemeyer"
}
```
The file `twisted/internet/cfsupport/cfsupport.c` (which is only compiled on OS X) is generated by an old version of Pyrex and contains non-standard C.  Re-generating this file with Pyrex 0.9.4 solves the problem.

**spkg**: [http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg](http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg)

Assignee: tbd

Resolution: fixed

Author: Jeroen Demeyer

Reviewer: Volker Braun

Merged: sage-5.0.beta6

Issue created by migration from https://trac.sagemath.org/ticket/12425





---

archive/issue_comments_176719.json:
```json
{
    "body": "Description changed:\n``````diff\n--- \n+++ \n@@ -1,6 +1,8 @@\n The file `twisted/internet/cfsupport/cfsupport.c` is generated by an old version of Pyrex and contains non-standard C.  Re-generating this file with Pyrex 0.9.4 solves the problem.\n \n We also add a fix for #12422 (add '-Dformat_arg(x)=' to `CFLAGS`).\n+\n+**spkg**: [http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg](http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg)\n \n Comment: 1\n \n``````\n",
    "created_at": "2012-02-04T12:56:31Z",
```

Description changed:
``````diff
--- 
+++ 
@@ -1,6 +1,8 @@
 The file `twisted/internet/cfsupport/cfsupport.c` is generated by an old version of Pyrex and contains non-standard C.  Re-generating this file with Pyrex 0.9.4 solves the problem.
 
 We also add a fix for #12422 (add '-Dformat_arg(x)=' to `CFLAGS`).
+
+**spkg**: [http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg](http://boxen.math.washington.edu/home/jdemeyer/spkg/twisted-9.0.p3.spkg)
 
 Comment: 1
 
``````
